items.content_html: ValGuard —— is a powerful yet lightweight profanity filter API designed to help developers easily integrate content moderation capabilities into their web applications. With ValGuard, you can efficiently detect and filter out toxic language, ensuring a cleaner and safer user experience for your platform.
items.title: mrExplorist/valguard-api: ValGuard —— is a powerful yet lightweight profanity filter API designed to help developers easily integrate content moderation capabilities into their web applications. With ValGuard, you can efficiently detect and filter out toxic language, ensuring a cleaner and safer user experience for your platform.
